name: CreateUserGroup
description:
Create a user group within a ClickUp workspace.

Use this tool to organize and manage users by creating a user group within a specific ClickUp workspace. Note that adding a guest with view-only permissions converts them to a paid guest, potentially incurring additional costs.

parameters.name: workspace_id
parameters.description: The unique ID of the ClickUp workspace where the user group will be created.

parameters.name: group_name
parameters.description: The name of the user group to be created within the workspace. This should be a descriptive name to identify the group easily.

parameters.name: user_group_members
parameters.description: List of user IDs to include in the user group. Each ID should be an integer representing a user within the workspace.

parameters.name: group_handle
parameters.description: A unique string identifier for the user group to be created. This will be used as the group's handle within the workspace.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the clickup API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
